New Records: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 stretch with a go-ahead, two-run double
Key Match Events: Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam for Minnesota
Willi Castro had an RBI single to snap an 0-for-16 skid during a three-run fourth inning for the Twins
Jhoan Duran surrendered three hits in the ninth, including an RBI single by Nolan Schanuel
Pre-Game Insights: Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Wallner expressed pride in the team's offense after the win
Rocco Baldelli highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins remain six games behind Cleveland and 1 1/2 behind Kansas City in the AL Central
The Twins are three ahead of Detroit for the final AL wild-card spot
Others: INF Brandon Drury left the game in the fifth inning with left hamstring tightness
OF Bryce Teodosio sustained a small finger fracture on a bunt attempt a night earlier
OF Byron Buxton (right hip inflammation) will be activated from the 10-day injured list prior to Friday's game against Cincinnati
